content: From lowly Neanderthal and Cro-Magnon, to early warriors and medieval knights. All leading up to lunkhead basketball man. Yes, our culture worshiped the aggressor throughout the ages and we end up with spoiled, overpaid, bonehead athletes who contribute little to civilization other than slam dunks and touchdowns. That is the inevitable world of Troy Bolton. But the path of the mind, the path we're on, ours is the path that has brought us to these people: Eleanor Roosevelt, Frida Kahlo, Sandra Day O'Connor, Madame Curie, Jane Goodall, Oprah Winfrey, and so many others who the world reveres.
author: Kenny Ortega
